document.full_text: a minnesota man courted investors with visions of a nascar-type race track and golf resorts in a more than $20 million investment fraud to support his luxury lifestyle, federal prosecutors said on thursday.
document.title: minnesota man's $20 million fraud fed lavish life: indictment
lines_and_colors: a minnesota man courted investors with visions of a nascar-type race track and golf resorts in a more than $20 million investment fraud to support his luxury lifestyle, federal prosecutors said on thursday.
